reviewText: Story is about boys from different sides of the tracks growing up during the unrest in Ireland between the Protestants and the Catholics. They use the backdrop of the movie Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid as a way to escape the problems in life.
Children don't have porejudices until somebody teaches them how to hate. I had seen Mickybo&me before, so I knew it was a masterpiece and wanted to have it for myself.

A great kid/adventure film.  It teaches the lesson of friendship over all else.  One boy is Catholic and the other Protestant in 1970 North Ireland.  Regardless, they have a great adventure as best friends.  If you are familiar with "Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid" it will have you howling with laughter.  Another great UK movie not available in US format.  Absolutely recommended!
